entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Kitchener-Waterloo
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:35 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -1.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Region of Waterloo Int'l Airport 09:00 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -1.7°C
Pressure: 102.0 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 78 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -5.0°C
Wind: NW 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 7.
entry.summary: Clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 7. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Showers. High 6.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to a few rain showers in the morning. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southeast 50 gusting to 80 in the afternoon. High 6. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2.
